Class.name: web.DHCDocMenuConfig

Method.name: InitWebsysExtMenu
Method.Implementation:
&sql(insert into sqluser.websys.ExtMenu (EMCode,EMText) values('DOCPRNOrder','医生长期医嘱菜单')) &sql(insert into sqluser.websys.ExtMenu (EMCode,EMText) values('DOCSOSOrder','医生临时医嘱菜单')) &sql(insert into sqluser.websys.ExtMenu (EMCode,EMText) values('NURPRNOrder','护士长期医嘱菜单')) &sql(insert into sqluser.websys.ExtMenu (EMCode,EMText) values('NURSOSOrder','护士临时医嘱菜单'))
&sql(insert into sqluser.websys.ExtMenu (EMCode,EMText) values('NURPRNExec','护士长期执行菜单')) &sql(insert into sqluser.websys.ExtMenu (EMCode,EMText) values('NURSOSExec','护士临时执行菜单'))
&sql(insert into sqluser.websys.ExtMenu (EMCode,EMText) values('NURPRNFee','护士长期费用菜单')) &sql(insert into sqluser.websys.ExtMenu (EMCode,EMText) values('NURSOSFee','护士临时费用菜单'))
s displayHandler = "{HIDDEN2_Disable:['D','E'],HIDDEN5_Disable:['N^N^N']}" &sql(insert into sqluser.websys.ExtMenu (EMCode,EMText,EMHandler,EMDisplayHandler,EMParentCode) values('DOCPRNOrderStop','停医嘱','stopOrderHandler',:displayHandler,'DOCPRNOrder'))
s displayHandler = "{HIDDEN2_Disable:['D','C','E'],HIDDEN5_Disable:['N^N^N']}" &sql(insert into sqluser.websys.ExtMenu (EMCode,EMText,EMHandler,EMDisplayHandler,EMParentCode) values('DOCPRNOrderCancel','撤消(DC)','cancelOrderHandler',:displayHandler,'DOCPRNOrder'))
s displayHandler = "{HIDDEN2_Disable:['U','E'],HIDDEN5_Display:['Y^Y^Y']}" &sql(insert into sqluser.websys.ExtMenu (EMCode,EMText,EMHandler,EMDisplayHandler,EMParentCode) values('DOCPRNOrderUnuse','作废','abortOrderHandler',:displayHandler,'DOCPRNOrder'))
s displayHandler="{HIDDEN4_Display: ['Prn','PRN','prn']}" &sql(insert into sqluser.websys.ExtMenu (EMCode,EMText,EMHandler,EMDisplayHandler,EMParentCode) values('DOCPRNAddExecOrder','增加执行医嘱','addExecOrderHandler',:displayHandler,'DOCPRNOrder'))
&sql(insert into sqluser.websys.ExtMenu (EMCode,EMText,EMParentCode) values('DOCPRNOrderCopyPrn','复制长期','DOCPRNOrder')) &sql(insert into sqluser.websys.ExtMenu (EMCode,EMText,EMParentCode) values('DOCPRNOrderCopySos','复制临时','DOCPRNOrder'))
//-------------- &sql(insert into sqluser.websys.ExtMenu (EMCode,EMText,EMParentCode,EMHandler,EMDisplayHandler) values('DOCSOSOrderSurgeryApply','手术申请','DOCSOSOrder','surgeryApplyHandler','surgeryApplyShowHandler')) &sql(insert into sqluser.websys.ExtMenu (EMCode,EMText,EMParentCode,EMHandler,EMDisplayHandler) values('DOCSOSOrderConsultation','会诊申请','DOCSOSOrder','consultationHandler','consultationShowHandler')) &sql(insert into sqluser.websys.ExtMenu (EMCode,EMText,EMParentCode,EMHandler,EMDisplayHandler) values('DOCSOSOrderBloodApply','输血申请','DOCSOSOrder','bloodApplyHandler','bloodApplyShowHandler'))
s displayHandler = "{HIDDEN2_Disable:['C','E'],HIDDEN5_Disable:['N^N^N']}" &sql(insert into sqluser.websys.ExtMenu (EMCode,EMText,EMParentCode,EMHandler,EMDisplayHandler) values('DOCSOSOrderCancel','撤消(DC)','DOCSOSOrder','cancelOrderHandler',:displayHandler)) s displayHandler = "{HIDDEN2_Disable:['U','E'],HIDDEN5_Display:['Y^Y^Y']}" &sql(insert into sqluser.websys.ExtMenu (EMCode,EMText,EMParentCode,EMHandler,EMDisplayHandler) values('DOCSOSOrderUnuse','作废','DOCSOSOrder','abortOrderHandler',:displayHandler))
&sql(insert into sqluser.websys.ExtMenu (EMCode,EMText,EMParentCode) values('DOCSOSOrderCopySos','复制临时','DOCSOSOrder'))
//------------------护士长期医嘱菜单 s displayHandler = "{HIDDEN2_Disable:['D','E'],HIDDEN5_Disable:['N^N^N']}" &sql(insert into sqluser.websys.ExtMenu (EMCode,EMText,EMParentCode,EMDisplayHandler,EMHandler) values('NURPRNOrderStop','停医嘱','NURPRNOrder',:displayHandler,'stopOrderHandler'))
s displayHandler = "{HIDDEN2_Disable:['D','C','E'],HIDDEN5_Disable:['N^N^N']}" &sql(insert into sqluser.websys.ExtMenu (EMCode,EMText,EMParentCode,EMDisplayHandler,EMHandler) values('NURPRNOrderCancel','撤消(DC)','NURPRNOrder',:displayHandler,'cancelOrderHandler'))
/* &sql(insert into sqluser.websys.ExtMenu (EMCode,EMText,EMParentCode,EMHandler) values('NURPRNOrderAddBillOrder','增加费用医嘱','NURPRNOrder','addBillOrderHandler')) */ s displayHandler = "{HIDDEN4_Display: ['Prn','PRN','prn']}" &sql(insert into sqluser.websys.ExtMenu (EMCode,EMText,EMParentCode,EMDisplayHandler,EMHandler) values('NURPRNOrderAddExecOrder','增加执行医嘱','NURPRNOrder',:displayHandler,'addExecOrderHandler'))
//---------------护士临时医嘱菜单
s displayHandler = "{HIDDEN2_Disable:['U','E'],HIDDEN5_Display:['Y^Y^Y']}" &sql(insert into sqluser.websys.ExtMenu (EMCode,EMText,EMParentCode,EMDisplayHandler,EMHandler) values('NURSOSOrderUnuse','作废','NURSOSOrder',:displayHandler,'abortOrderHandler'))
s displayHandler = "{HIDDEN2_Disable:['C','E'],HIDDEN5_Disable:['N^N^N']}" &sql(insert into sqluser.websys.ExtMenu (EMCode,EMText,EMParentCode,EMDisplayHandler,EMHandler) values('NURSOSOrderCancel','撤消(DC)','NURSOSOrder',:displayHandler,'cancelOrderHandler'))
//-----护士长期执行菜单 s displayHandler = "{TExecStateCode_Display:['未执行','C']}" &sql(insert into sqluser.websys.ExtMenu (EMCode,EMText,EMParentCode,EMDisplayHandler,EMHandler) values('NURPRNExecRun','执行','NURPRNExec',:displayHandler,'runExecOrderHandler'))
s displayHandler = "{TExecStateCode_Display:['未执行','C']}" &sql(insert into sqluser.websys.ExtMenu (EMCode,EMText,EMParentCode,EMDisplayHandler,EMHandler) values('NURPRNExecStop','停止执行','NURPRNExec',:displayHandler,'stopExecOrderHandler'))
s displayHandler = "{TExecFreeChargeFlag_Disabled: ['免费']}" &sql(insert into sqluser.websys.ExtMenu (EMCode,EMText,EMParentCode,EMDisplayHandler,EMHandler) values('NURPRNExecFree','免费','NURPRNExec',:displayHandler,'freeExecOrderHandler'))
s displayHandler = "{TExecFreeChargeFlag_Display: ['免费']}" &sql(insert into sqluser.websys.ExtMenu (EMCode,EMText,EMParentCode,EMDisplayHandler,EMHandler) values('NURPRNExecCancelFree','取消免费','NURPRNExec',:displayHandler,'cancelFreeExecOrderHandler'))
s displayHandler = "{TExecStateCode_Display: ['F']}" &sql(insert into sqluser.websys.ExtMenu (EMCode,EMText,EMParentCode,EMDisplayHandler,EMHandler) values('NURPRNExecCancel','撤消执行','NURPRNExec',:displayHandler,'cancelExecOrderHandler'))
s displayHandler = "{TExecStateCode_Display:['F']}" &sql(insert into sqluser.websys.ExtMenu (EMCode,EMText,EMParentCode,EMDisplayHandler,EMHandler) values('NURPRNExecAddFee','增加费用','NURPRNExec',:displayHandler,'addFeeExecOrderHandler'))
s displayHandler = "{HIDDEN2_Display: ['D']}" &sql(insert into sqluser.websys.ExtMenu (EMCode,EMText,EMParentCode,EMDisplayHandler,EMHandler) values('NURPRNExecUpdateHour','修改小时医嘱结束时间','NURPRNExec',:displayHandler,'UpdateHourOrderEndTimeHandler')) //-----护士临时执行菜单
s displayHandler = "{TExecStateCode_Display:['未执行','C']}" &sql(insert into sqluser.websys.ExtMenu (EMCode,EMText,EMParentCode,EMDisplayHandler,EMHandler) values('NURSOSExecRun','执行','NURSOSExec',:displayHandler,'runExecOrderHandler'))
s displayHandler = "{ HIDDEN2_Display: ['D','C','U'], TExecStateCode_Display:['未执行','C'] }" &sql(insert into sqluser.websys.ExtMenu (EMCode,EMText,EMParentCode,EMDisplayHandler,EMHandler) values('NURSOSExecStop','停止执行','NURSOSExec',:displayHandler,'stopExecOrderHandler'))
s displayHandler = "{TExecFreeChargeFlag_Disabled: ['免费']}" &sql(insert into sqluser.websys.ExtMenu (EMCode,EMText,EMParentCode,EMDisplayHandler,EMHandler) values('NURSOSExecFree','免费','NURSOSExec',:displayHandler,'freeExecOrderHandler'))
s displayHandler = "{TExecFreeChargeFlag_Display: ['免费']}" &sql(insert into sqluser.websys.ExtMenu (EMCode,EMText,EMParentCode,EMDisplayHandler,EMHandler) values('NURSOSExecCancelFree','取消免费','NURSOSExec',:displayHandler,'cancelFreeExecOrderHandler'))
s displayHandler = "{TExecStateCode_Display: ['F']}" &sql(insert into sqluser.websys.ExtMenu (EMCode,EMText,EMParentCode,EMDisplayHandler,EMHandler) values('NURSOSExecCancel','撤消执行','NURSOSExec',:displayHandler,'cancelExecOrderHandler'))
s displayHandler = "{TExecStateCode_Display:['F']}" &sql(insert into sqluser.websys.ExtMenu (EMCode,EMText,EMParentCode,EMDisplayHandler,EMHandler) values('NURSOSExecAddFee','增加费用','NURSOSExec',:displayHandler,'addFeeExecOrderHandler'))
s displayHandler = "{HIDDEN2_Display: ['D']}" &sql(insert into sqluser.websys.ExtMenu (EMCode,EMText,EMParentCode,EMDisplayHandler,EMHandler) values('NURSOSExecUpdateHour','修改小时医嘱结束时间','NURSOSExec',:displayHandler,'UpdateHourOrderEndTimeHandler'))
//-----费用菜单
s displayHandler = "{HIDDEN2_Disable: ['R']}" &sql(insert into sqluser.websys.ExtMenu (EMCode,EMText,EMParentCode,EMDisplayHandler,EMHandler) values('NURPRNFeeCancel','取消费用','NURPRNFee',:displayHandler,'cancelFeeOrderHandler'))
s displayHandler = "{HIDDEN2_Disable: ['R']}" &sql(insert into sqluser.websys.ExtMenu (EMCode,EMText,EMParentCode,EMDisplayHandler,EMHandler) values('NURSOSFeeCancel','取消费用','NURSOSFee',:displayHandler,'cancelFeeOrderHandler'))

Method.name: updateDisplay
Method.Description: 更新显示函数,把停止 撤销 作废标志分成三列
Method.Implementation:
;StopPermission,CancelPermission,UnusePermission
s displayHandler = "{HIDDEN2_Disable:['D','E'],StopPermission_Disable:['0']}" &sql(update sqluser.websys.ExtMenu set EMDisplayHandler=:displayHandler where EMCode='DOCPRNOrderStop')
s displayHandler = "{HIDDEN2_Disable:['D','E'],CancelPermission_Disable:['0']}" &sql(update sqluser.websys.ExtMenu set EMDisplayHandler=:displayHandler where EMCode='DOCPRNOrderCancel')
s displayHandler = "{HIDDEN2_Disable:['D','E'],UnusePermission_Disable:['0']}" &sql(update sqluser.websys.ExtMenu set EMDisplayHandler=:displayHandler where EMCode='DOCPRNOrderUnuse')
s displayHandler = "{HIDDEN2_Disable:['D','E'],UnusePermission_Disable:['0']}" &sql(update sqluser.websys.ExtMenu set EMDisplayHandler=:displayHandler where EMCode='DOCSOSOrderUnuse')
s displayHandler = "{HIDDEN2_Disable:['D','E'],CancelPermission_Disable:['0']}" &sql(update sqluser.websys.ExtMenu set EMDisplayHandler=:displayHandler where EMCode='DOCSOSOrderCancel')
s displayHandler = "{HIDDEN2_Disable:['D','E'],StopPermission_Disable:['0']}" &sql(update sqluser.websys.ExtMenu set EMDisplayHandler=:displayHandler where EMCode='NURPRNOrderStop')
s displayHandler = "{HIDDEN2_Disable:['D','E'],CancelPermission_Disable:['0']}" &sql(update sqluser.websys.ExtMenu set EMDisplayHandler=:displayHandler where EMCode='NURPRNOrderCancel')
s displayHandler = "{HIDDEN2_Disable:['D','E'],UnusePermission_Disable:['0']}" &sql(update sqluser.websys.ExtMenu set EMDisplayHandler=:displayHandler where EMCode='NURSOSOrderUnuse')
s displayHandler = "{HIDDEN2_Disable:['D','E'],CancelPermission_Disable:['0']}" &sql(update sqluser.websys.ExtMenu set EMDisplayHandler=:displayHandler where EMCode='NURSOSOrderCancel')

Method.name: GetExtTreeJson
Method.Implementation: q:groupid="" "" ;i parentNode="" s parentNode=-100000000000000 i parentNode="menuTreeRoot" s parentNode="" s parentNode = " "_$$ALPHAUP^SSUTIL4(parentNode) s treejson="" s index=0 f s index = $o(^websys.ExtMenuI("EMChildrenMenu",parentNode,index)) q:index="" d .s id = 0 f s id = $o(^websys.ExtMenuI("EMChildrenMenu",parentNode,index,id)) q:id="" d ..s obj = ##class(websys.ExtMenu).%OpenId(id,0) ..s checkflag=0 ..i $d(^SSU("SSGRP",groupid,"Menu")) d ...s checkflag=$bit($p(^SSU("SSGRP",groupid,"Menu"),"^",1),id) ..s checkflag=$s(checkflag:"true",1:"false") ..i treejson="" s treejson = obj.GetTreeNodeJson(checkflag) ..e s treejson=treejson_","_obj.GetTreeNodeJson(checkflag) ..d obj.%Close() ..s obj = "" q "["_treejson_"]"

UDLText.name: T
UDLText.Content:
/* ClassMethod GetExtMenuJson(node) { m menu = ^websys.ExtMenu s json="" if (node="menuTreeRoot") d . s root="" f s root=$o(menu(root)) q:root="" d . . s item = "{text:'"_menu(root)_"', id:'"_root_"'}" . . i json = "" s json = item . . e s json=json_","_item else d . s gbl="", ind="" . s len=$l(node,"-") . f i=1:1:len d . . s item = """"_$p(node,"-",i)_"""" . . i gbl="" s gbl = "menu("_item . . e s gbl=gbl_","_item . s gbl=gbl_",ind)" . f d GetItemJson q:ind="" d . .d DataGbl . .s treenode="{text:'"_text_"',id:'"_node_"-"_ind_"',leaf:"_$s(dataflag=1:"true",1:"false")_",checked:false}" . .i json="" s json=treenode . .e s json=json_","_treenode q "["_json_"]"
GetItemJson s oexec = "ind=$o("_gbl_")" s @oexec q:ind="" s vexec = "text="_gbl s @vexec q DataGbl s dexec = "dataflag=$d("_gbl_")" s @dexec q }*/

Method.name: SaveMenuGroupSetting
Method.Description: @params: code1!0^code2!1 0表示没有权限 ,1表示有权限 d ##class(web.DHCDocMenuConfig).SaveMenuGroupSetting("DOCPRN^DOCPRNStop^DOCPRNCancel",21)
Method.Implementation: s ^Temp("wanghc","savegtl")=codes_","_groupid q:groupid="" 100 q:codes="" 100 s len=$l(codes,"^") s gobj = ##class(User.SSExtMeunGroup).%OpenId(groupid) q:'$IsObject(gobj) s menubit=gobj.DHCEMGExtMenu f j=1:1:len d .s code=$p($p(codes,"^",j),"!",1) .s grant = $p($p(codes,"^",j),"!",2) .q:code="" .s id = $O(^websys.ExtMenuI("EMCodeMenu"," "_$$ALPHAUP^SSUTIL4(code),"")) .q:id="" .s $bit(menubit,id)=grant s gobj.DHCEMGExtMenu = menubit d gobj.%Save() d gobj.%Close() s gobj="" q 0

Method.name: GetGroupTreeJson
Method.Implementation: s rtnJson="" s rowid=0 f s rowid=$o(^SSU("SSGRP",rowid)) q:rowid="" d .s Desc=$p(^SSU("SSGRP",rowid),"^",1) .q:(groupDesc'="")&&($$ALPHAUP^SSUTIL4(Desc)'[$$ALPHAUP^SSUTIL4(groupDesc)) .if rtnJson="" d ..s rtnJson=rtnJson_"{id:'"_rowid_"',text:'"_Desc_"',leaf:true}" .else d ..s rtnJson=rtnJson_",{id:'"_rowid_"',text:'"_Desc_"',leaf:true}" q "["_rtnJson_"]"

Method.name: GetMenuItemInfo
Method.Implementation: s id = $O(^websys.ExtMenuI("EMCodeMenu"," "_$$ALPHAUP^SSUTIL4(code),"")) q:id="" "{}" s obj = ##class(websys.ExtMenu).%OpenId(id,0) s jsonObj = ##class(ext.util.JsonObject).%New() s json = jsonObj.FromObject(obj).Json() d jsonObj.%Close() s jsonObj="" Q json

Method.name: SaveExtMenu
Method.Implementation: s jsonObj = ##class(ext.util.JsonObject).%New() s jsonObj.ContainNullValue=1 //删除属性值时用到 d jsonObj.FromObject(reqJson) s obj = jsonObj.Bean("websys.ExtMenu") s sc = obj.%Save() If $$$ISERR(sc) Quit "-306" q 0

Method.name: DeleteExtMenu
Method.Implementation: s index="",parentCode = " "_$$ALPHAUP^SSUTIL4(code),sc=$$$OK q:$$$ISERR(sc) "sc" f s index=$o(^websys.ExtMenuI("EMChildrenMenu",parentCode,index)) q:(index="")||($$$ISERR(sc)) d .s id="" f s id = $o(^websys.ExtMenuI("EMChildrenMenu",parentCode,index,id)) q:(id="")||($$$ISERR(sc)) d ..s sc = ##class(websys.ExtMenu).%DeleteId(id) Q:$$$ISERR(sc) "-306" s id = $O(^websys.ExtMenuI("EMCodeMenu",parentCode,"")) s sc = ##class(websys.ExtMenu).%DeleteId(id) Q:$$$ISERR(sc) "-306" q 0
